tasks.title: Fix critical bug in production
tasks.description: This is a critical bug that needs to be fixed immediately. The system is logging users out after 5 minutes which is causing major issues with user experience.

tasks.title: Complete project proposal
tasks.description: Finalize and submit the Q1 project proposal including timeline, budget, and resource allocation. Client presentation is scheduled for next week.

tasks.title: Review code pull requests
tasks.description: Review and approve pending code pull requests from the development team. Check for code quality, testing coverage, and adherence to standards.

tasks.title: Prepare monthly budget report
tasks.description: Compile and analyze all expenses for February. Create summary report with projections for Q1 spending.

tasks.title: Schedule team meeting
tasks.description: Organize and schedule monthly team sync meeting. Prepare agenda covering project updates, blockers, and upcoming deadlines.

tasks.title: Update documentation
tasks.description: Update API documentation with new endpoints and parameters added in the latest release. Include examples and error codes.

tasks.title: Annual health checkup
tasks.description: Schedule and complete annual health checkup at the clinic. Don't forget to bring insurance card and previous medical records.

tasks.title: Plan vacation
tasks.description: Book flights and hotel for summer vacation. Look into travel insurance and create itinerary for the trip.

tasks.title: Home renovation project
tasks.description: Get quotes from contractors for kitchen renovation. Review design plans and finalize budget before contract signing.

tasks.title: Q2 planning and strategy
tasks.description: Develop Q2 strategic plan including product roadmap, marketing initiatives, and team goals. Align with company objectives.
